osgART::TrackerContainer

osgART::TrackerContainer Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for osgART::TrackerContainer:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Its single purpose of existance is to get arround restrictions within osgIntrospection and RTTI accross DLL boundaries.

Parameters:

void osgART::TrackerContainer::update (   )  [virtual]
 

Request that the tracker update the position of tracked markers, using the most recent image supplied by setImage.
